key_talking_points: Florida maintains a one-goal lead early in the first period with the score at 5-4.
The teams are exchanging shots, with Florida registering a shot on goal at 1:12 after a missed shot at 1:06.
Edmonton will need to tighten up defensively to limit Florida's chances and get back in the game.
for_commentary_agent.context: The game has a moderate momentum score due to shots and a missed shot, but the early stage of the first period and the one-goal difference warrant a mixed coverage approach. We should balance play-by-play with some analysis of the game's flow.

high_intensity_events.summary: Shot on goal by FLA at 1:12

task_details.specific_guidance: Provide play-by-play for scoring chances and shots on goal, but also discuss team strategies and individual player matchups. Mention the shot count and how the teams are generating offense.
